title: Google\Cloud\Trace\V2\Span_Attributes
name: Span_Attributes
description:
A set of attributes, each in the format [KEY]:[VALUE].

Generated from protobuf message google.devtools.cloudtrace.v2.Span.Attributes

Extends \Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

methods.name: getAttributeMap
methods.description:
The set of attributes. Each attribute's key can be up to 128 bytes long. The value can be a string up to 256 bytes, an integer, or the Boolean values true and false. For example: "/instance_id": "my-instance" "/http/user_agent": "" "/http/request_bytes": 300 "abc.com/myattribute": true

Generated from protobuf field map<string, .google.devtools.cloudtrace.v2.AttributeValue> attribute_map = 1;

methods.name: setAttributeMap
methods.description:

Generated from protobuf field map<string, .google.devtools.cloudtrace.v2.AttributeValue> attribute_map = 1;

params.name: var
params.description: The set of attributes. Each attribute's key can be up to 128 bytes long. The value can be a string up to 256 bytes, an integer, or the Boolean values true and false. For example: "/instance_id": "my-instance" "/http/user_agent": "" "/http/request_bytes": 300 "abc.com/myattribute": true

methods.name: getDroppedAttributesCount
methods.description:
The number of attributes that were discarded. Attributes can be discarded because their keys are too long or because there are too many attributes.

If this value is 0 then all attributes are valid.

Generated from protobuf field int32 dropped_attributes_count = 2;
